title: I was charged more than once when I used Tap N' Pay. What do I do?
content:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

## Articles in this section

- [How do I use and activate Tap N' Pay?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/34932356672537-How-do-I-use-and-activate-Tap-N-Pay)
- [I can’t pay using GCash Tap N' Pay. What should I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/29803032229529-I-can-t-pay-using-GCash-Tap-N-Pay-What-should-I-do)
- [I used Tap N' Pay but the merchant didn’t receive the payment and/or SMS confirmation. What should I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/39131881310489-I-used-Tap-N-Pay-but-the-merchant-didn-t-receive-the-payment-and-or-SMS-confirmation-What-should-I-do)
- [I was charged more than once when I used Tap N' Pay. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/40300421330073-I-was-charged-more-than-once-when-I-used-Tap-N-Pay-What-do-I-do)

## Promoted articles

- [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account)
- [Accepted IDs for GCash Verification](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-Accepted-IDs-for-GCash-Verification)
- [How do I send money to another GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566614-How-do-I-send-money-to-another-GCash-account)

If you were charged more than once for a single transaction using Tap N' Pay, [click here to ask for help](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=360000706713&ind=normal&tf_360023219534=tap_to_pay__i_was_deducted_more_than_once_for_a_single_transaction). A customer service representative will contact you in **24 hours.**

### **Need more Help?**

For other inquiries or concerns, check out the following articles:

- [GCash Tap N' Pay](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/34932356672537-GCash-Tap-to-Pay)
- [I can’t pay using GCash Tap N' Pay. What should I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/29803032229529-I-can-t-pay-using-GCash-Tap-to-Pay-What-should-I-do)
- [I used Tap N' Pay but the merchant didn’t receive the payment and/or SMS confirmation. What should I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/39131881310489-I-used-Tap-to-Pay-but-the-merchant-didn-t-receive-the-payment-and-or-SMS-confirmation-What-should-I-do)

[Next](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/40300421330073-I-was-charged-more-than-once-when-I-used-Tap-N-Pay-What-do-I-do#)
